aap.description: Apply Affine Projection algorithm to first audio stream.

acontrast.description: Simple audio dynamic range compression/expansion filter.

acopy.description: Copy the input audio unchanged to the output.

acue.description: Delay filtering to match a cue.

acrossfade.description: Cross fade two input audio streams.

nb_samples.description: set number of samples for cross fade duration

ns.description: set number of samples for cross fade duration

overlap.description: overlap 1st stream end with 2nd stream start

o.description: overlap 1st stream end with 2nd stream start

curve1.description: set fade curve type for 1st stream

c1.description: set fade curve type for 1st stream

curve2.description: set fade curve type for 2nd stream

c2.description: set fade curve type for 2nd stream

adeclick.description: Remove impulsive noise from input audio.

adelay.description: Delay one or more audio channels.

delays.description: set list of delays for each channel

all.description: use last available delay for remained channels

adenorm.description: Remedy denormals by adding extremely low-level noise.

adynamicequalizer.description: Apply Dynamic Equalization of input audio.

adynamicsmooth.description: Apply Dynamic Smoothing of input audio.

aeval.description: Filter audio signal according to a specified expression.

exprs.description: set the '|'-separated list of channels expressions

aexciter.description: Enhance high frequency part of audio.

start_sample.description: set number of first sample to start fading

ss.description: set number of first sample to start fading

nb_samples.description: set number of samples for fade duration

ns.description: set number of samples for fade duration

afftfilt.description: Apply arbitrary expressions to samples in frequency domain.

afir.description: Apply Finite Impulse Response filter with supplied coefficients in additional stream(s).

channel.description: set IR channel to display frequency response

aformat.description: Convert the input audio to one of the specified formats.

afreqshift.description: Apply frequency shifting to input audio.

samples.description: set frame size in number of samples

aiir.description: Apply Infinite Impulse Response filter with supplied coefficients.

channel.description: set IR channel to display frequency response

size.description: max number of samples to loop

amerge.description: Merge two or more audio streams into a single multi-channel stream.

file.description: set file where to print metadata information

direct.description: reduce buffering when printing to user-set file or pipe

dropout_transition.description: Transition time, in seconds, for volume renormalization when an input stream ends.

anequalizer.description: Apply high-order audio parametric multi band equalizer.

anlmdn.description: Reduce broadband noise from stream using Non-Local Means.

anlmf.description: Apply Normalized Least-Mean-Fourth algorithm to first audio stream.

anlms.description: Apply Normalized Least-Mean-Squares algorithm to first audio stream.

anull.description: Pass the source unchanged to the output.

pad_len.description: set number of samples of silence to add

whole_len.description: set minimum target number of samples in the audio stream

pad_dur.description: set duration of silence to add

whole_dur.description: set minimum target duration in the audio stream

aperms.description: Set permissions for the output audio frame.

seed.description: set the seed for the random mode

aphaser.description: Add a phasing effect to the audio.

aphaseshift.description: Apply phase shifting to input audio.

arealtime.description: Slow down filtering to match realtime.

arls.description: Apply Recursive Least Squares algorithm to first audio stream.

arnndn.description: Reduce noise from speech using Recurrent Neural Networks.

timestamps.description: timestamps of input at which to split input

samples.description: samples at which to split input

aselect.description: Select audio frames to pass in output.

expr.description: set an expression to use for selecting frames

e.description: set an expression to use for selecting frames

asetnsamples.description: Set the number of samples for each output audio frames.

nb_out_samples.description: set the number of per-frame output samples

n.description: set the number of per-frame output samples

asetpts.description: Set PTS for the output audio frame.

asetrate.description: Change the sample rate without altering the data.

asettb.description: Set timebase for the audio output link.

expr.description: set expression determining the output timebase

tb.description: set expression determining the output timebase

ashowinfo.description: Show textual information for each audio frame.

aspectralstats.description: Show frequency domain statistics about audio frames.

measure.description: select the parameters which are measured

asplit.description: Pass on the audio input to N audio outputs.

astats.description: Show time domain statistics about audio frames.

reset.description: Set the number of frames over which cumulative stats are calculated before being reset

measure_perchannel.description: Select the parameters which are measured per channel

measure_overall.description: Select the parameters which are measured overall

asuperpass.description: Apply high order Butterworth band-pass filter.

asuperstop.description: Apply high order Butterworth band-stop filter.

atrim.description: Pick one continuous section from the input, drop the rest.

start.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be passed

starti.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be passed

end.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be dropped again

endi.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be dropped again

start_pts.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be  passed

end_pts.description: Timestamp of the first frame that should be dropped again

start_sample.description: Number of the first audio sample that should be passed to the output

end_sample.description: Number of the first audio sample that should be dropped again

azmq.description: Receive commands through ZMQ and broker them to filters.

bandpass.description: Apply a two-pole Butterworth band-pass filter.

bandreject.description: Apply a two-pole Butterworth band-reject filter.

biquad.description: Apply a biquad IIR filter with the given coefficients.

map.description: A comma-separated list of input channel numbers in output order.

chorus.description: Add a chorus effect to the audio.

compand.description: Compress or expand audio dynamic range.

attacks.description: set time over which increase of volume is determined

decays.description: set time over which decrease of volume is determined

delay.description: set delay for samples before sending them to volume adjuster

dcshift.description: Apply a DC shift to the audio.

framelen.description: set the frame length in msec

f.description: set the frame length in msec

curve.description: set the custom peak mapping curve

v.description: set the custom peak mapping curve

dualmono.description: treat mono input files as dual-mono

panlaw.description: set a specific pan law for dual-mono files

target.description: set a specific target level in LUFS (-23 to 0)

scale.description: sets display method for the stats

extrastereo.description: Increase difference between stereo audio channels.

flanger.description: Apply a flanging effect to the audio.

width.description: percentage of delayed signal mixed with original

phase.description: swept wave percentage phase-shift for multi-channel

hdcd.description: Apply High Definition Compatible Digital (HDCD) decoding.

disable_autoconvert.description: Disable any format conversion or resampling in the filter graph.

process_stereo.description: Process stereo channels together. Only apply target_gain when both channels match.

cdt_ms.description: Code detect timer period in ms.

force_pe.description: Always extend peaks above -3dBFS even when PE is not signaled.

analyze_mode.description: Replace audio with solid tone and signal some processing aspect in the amplitude.

bits_per_sample.description: Valid bits per sample (location of the true LSB).

headphone.description: Apply headphone binaural spatialization with HRTFs in additional streams.

highpass.description: Apply a high-pass filter with 3dB point frequency.

join.description: Join multiple audio streams into multi-channel output.

channel_layout.description: Channel layout of the output stream.

map.description: A comma-separated list of channels maps in the format 'input_stream.input_channel-output_channel.

measured_TP.description: measured true peak of input file

measured_tp.description: measured true peak of input file

lowpass.description: Apply a low-pass filter with 3dB point frequency.

mcompand.description: Multiband Compress or expand audio dynamic range.

start_periods.description: set periods of silence parts to skip from start

start_duration.description: set start duration of non-silence part

start_threshold.description: set threshold for start silence detection

start_silence.description: set start duration of silence part to keep

start_mode.description: set which channel will trigger trimming from start

stop_periods.description: set periods of silence parts to skip from end

stop_duration.description: set stop duration of silence part

stop_threshold.description: set threshold for stop silence detection

stop_silence.description: set stop duration of silence part to keep

stop_mode.description: set which channel will trigger trimming from end

window.description: set duration of window for silence detection

timestamp.description: set how every output frame timestamp is processed

fc_in.description: set front center channel input level

fc_out.description: set front center channel output level

fl_in.description: set front left channel input level

fl_out.description: set front left channel output level

fr_in.description: set front right channel input level

fr_out.description: set front right channel output level

sl_in.description: set side left channel input level

sl_out.description: set side left channel output level

sr_in.description: set side right channel input level

sr_out.description: set side right channel output level

bl_in.description: set back left channel input level

bl_out.description: set back left channel output level

br_in.description: set back right channel input level

br_out.description: set back right channel output level

bc_in.description: set back center channel input level

bc_out.description: set back center channel output level

fcx.description: set front center channel x spread

flx.description: set front left channel x spread

frx.description: set front right channel x spread

blx.description: set back left channel x spread

brx.description: set back right channel x spread

slx.description: set side left channel x spread

srx.description: set side right channel x spread

bcx.description: set back center channel x spread

fcy.description: set front center channel y spread

fly.description: set front left channel y spread

fry.description: set front right channel y spread

bly.description: set back left channel y spread

bry.description: set back right channel y spread

sly.description: set side left channel y spread

sry.description: set side right channel y spread

bcy.description: set back center channel y spread

replaygain.description: Apply replaygain side data when present

aevalsrc.description: Generate an audio signal generated by an expression.

exprs.description: set the '|'-separated list of channels expressions

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

afdelaysrc.description: Generate a Fractional delay FIR coefficients.

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

taps.description: set number of taps for delay filter

t.description: set number of taps for delay filter

afireqsrc.description: Generate a FIR equalizer coefficients audio stream.

bands.description: set central frequency values per band

b.description: set central frequency values per band

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

afirsrc.description: Generate a FIR coefficients audio stream.

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

anullsrc.description: Null audio source, return empty audio frames.

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

hilbert.description: Generate a Hilbert transform FIR coefficients.

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

sinc.description: Generate a sinc kaiser-windowed low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, or band-reject FIR coefficients.

nb_samples.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

n.description: set the number of samples per requested frame

hptaps.description: set number of taps for high-pass filter

lptaps.description: set number of taps for low-pass filter

samples_per_frame.description: set the number of samples per frame

anullsink.description: Do absolutely nothing with the input audio.

a3dscope.description: Convert input audio to 3d scope video output.

abitscope.description: Convert input audio to audio bit scope video output.

adrawgraph.description: Draw a graph using input audio metadata.

ahistogram.description: Convert input audio to histogram video output.

rheight.description: set histogram ratio of window height

aphasemeter.description: Convert input audio to phase meter video output.

phasing.description: set mono and out-of-phase detection output

tolerance.description: set phase tolerance for mono detection

t.description: set phase tolerance for mono detection

angle.description: set angle threshold for out-of-phase detection

a.description: set angle threshold for out-of-phase detection

duration.description: set minimum mono or out-of-phase duration in seconds

d.description: set minimum mono or out-of-phase duration in seconds

avectorscope.description: Convert input audio to vectorscope video output.

swap.description: swap x axis with y axis

showcqt.description: Convert input audio to a CQT (Constant/Clamped Q Transform) spectrum video output.

showcwt.description: Convert input audio to a CWT (Continuous Wavelet Transform) spectrum video output.

showfreqs.description: Convert input audio to a frequencies video output.

showspatial.description: Convert input audio to a spatial video output.

showspectrum.description: Convert input audio to a spectrum video output.

showspectrumpic.description: Convert input audio to a spectrum video output single picture.

showvolume.description: Convert input audio volume to video output.

dmc.description: set color of the max value line

showwaves.description: Convert input audio to a video output.

n.description: set how many samples to show in the same point

showwavespic.description: Convert input audio to a video output single picture.

spectrumsynth.description: Convert input spectrum videos to audio output.

avsynctest.description: Generate an Audio Video Sync Test.

abuffer.description: Buffer audio frames, and make them accessible to the filterchain.

abuffersink.description: Buffer audio frames, and make them available to the end of the filter graph.

ch_layouts.description: set a '|'-separated list of supported channel layouts
